channel.title: If you know about BufferedWriters look here!
channel.description:
Hey is there a way to tell the buffer writer to re-write a line if it begins with a certain string of letters?
That would help me much, and I could give much in return :D
Thanks in advance.

item.title: If you know about BufferedWriters look here!
item.dc:creator: @slay_blad3 slay blad3
item.description:
@slay_blad3 wrote:

Can you look into it some and post here please? I mean i figured it was possible but I know absolutely nothing about BW’s or BR’s

I’d love you forever.

Read full topic
item.source: If you know about BufferedWriters look here!

item.title: If you know about BufferedWriters look here!
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

I believe the String class has a method, startsWith(String string). Returns a boolean on the condition of the usage.
